<Text: Snow White's Scary Adventures is a dark ride at the Disneyland, Tokyo Disneyland, Disneyland Park (Paris) theme parks, and formerly the Magic Kingdom theme park at the Walt Disney World Resort.>

Text: Snow White's Scary Adventures:  The ride's story is based on Disney's 1937 film, "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs", their first animated feature film.
